WEIBO_AUTH_ALERT_TITLE: Enter the Weibo password for “%@” in Settings.
WEIBO_AUTH_ALERT_MESSAGE_OSX: Enter the password for “%@” in System Preferences.
WEIBO_AUTH_ERROR_NO_CREDENTIAL: The account could not be verified because it does not have the necessary credentials.
WEIBO_AUTH_ERROR_NOT_PERMITTED: The application does not have permission to add Weibo accounts using a password.
